text: Barcza is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Masłów, Kielce County, Świętokrzyskie Voivodeship, in south-central Poland. Barcza may also refer to: * Gedeon Barcza (1911-1986), Hungarian chess grandmaster ** Barcza System, a chess opening * Peter Barcza (born 1949), Canadian operatic baritone ==See also== *
title: Barcza (disambiguation)
